title: PBE Error
body: I just got accepted into PBE waiting for a year. I had 0 RP and 0 IP, when I click play, It said an error. I went to the lol status it said you need to own at least 16 champions in order to play. With no amount of currency, i tried to buy a champion: Ahri. It worked, however I still can't play, because I have 13 champions. I refunded Ahri, now I can't buy anything that will get me 16 champions. Please help.

replies.body: Sometimes there's a delay in adding the PBE stipend to your account automatically. Are you still missing the stipend? If so, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help you out.
